data.prayer: Jesus, 3,766,800 people live in the state of Paraíba. Please, give them 753 new simple churches this year.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Paraíba, Brazil
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 2,442,435 cultural Christians in the state of Paraíba to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 939,410 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Paraíba.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Paraíba, Brazil.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Pipipa people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Paraíba, Brazil.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: There are 3,766,800 people living in the state of Paraíba. Only about 939,410 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the state of Paraíba, Brazil has a population of 3,766,800.

We estimate Paraíba has 939,410 people who might know Jesus, 2,442,435 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 384,956 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Paraíba, Brazil know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

location.name: Paraíba
location.cities_list: João Pessoa, Campina Grande, Santa Rita, Patos, Bayeux
location.cities_list_w_pop: João Pessoa (650,883), Campina Grande (348,936), Santa Rita (119,893), Patos (92,575), Bayeux (91,056)
